feed.title: GVG's KB
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive, and powerful Jekyll theme for presenting professional writing.

entry.title: How I created this blog!
entry.summary:
Setting up this website
Jekyll is a static site generator that transforms your plain text into beautiful static web sites and blogs. It can be use for a documentation site, a blog, an event site, or really any web site you like. It’s fast, secure, easy, and open source. It’s also the same site generator I use to maintain my open source documentation. Today, we’ll be installing and configu...
